full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Title and Reference Number

* Title (English): Welcoming Francophone Communities Podcasts  
* Title (French): Balados pour les communautés francophones accueillantes  
* Reference Number: [PW-22-01013408](#reference-number)

## Tender Details
* Contracting Entity: Citizenship and Immigration Canada  
* Location: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada  
* Tender Status: Expiration Date: 2022-12-12T14:00:00
* Solicitation Number: CIC-155071  
* Publication Date: 2022-11-17

## Tender Description
Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada's Communications Branch seeks the services of an audio-visual company to produce ten episodes of a public podcast targeting French-speaking immigrants. The goal is to enlighten potential newcomers and existing residents in Canada about their options to move to any of the Welcoming Francophone Communities in Canada outside of Quebec.

## Tender Documents and Forms

Accessible at [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca):

1. [RFQ RFP Medium/High Template - Nov 2021 - Final (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/a77985df10e075ac4346ebf78c797b36/cic-155071_-_rfp_med_high_template_dec_2021_-_final.pdf)
2. [RFQ RFP Amendment-Michier (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/12/bcfdf6118e97bcf6156f6e618fe11e98/amendment_modification_01_-_solicitation_cic-155071.pdf)
3. Questions and Answers Document - CIC - 155071 - English French (Multi-language providing English as the Default)

Note that the original text was later updated with that RFC MEDIUM/HIGH template but it wasn't correctly linked like is normal on the page. We have decided to keep the updates as presented.

## Additional Information
* procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding (Concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)  
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada  
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC))  
* Notice URL: None  
* Contact
